title: Italy PM Giorgia Meloni Wishes PM Modi On His 74th Birthday
content: PM Modi Birthday: Italy Prime Minister Giorgia Meloni took to X to wish a happy birthday to her Indian counterpart Narendra Modi who turned 74 on Tuesday and said they will continue to strengthen the ties between the two countries.
summary: PM Modi Birthday: Italy Prime Minister Giorgia Meloni took to X to wish a happy birthday to her Indian counterpart Narendra Modi who turned 74 on Tuesday and said they will continue to strengthen the ties between the two countries.

title: China Landlord Tries To Evict Cancer-Stricken Tenant Over Property Value
content: Upon learning of her terminal cancer diagnosis, Zhang cited concerns that her death on the property would stigmatise it as a "haunted house."
summary: Upon learning of her terminal cancer diagnosis, Zhang cited concerns that her death on the property would stigmatise it as a "haunted house."

title: Giorgia Meloni's Far-Right Ally Raffaele Fitto Gets Top European Union Role
content: Raffaele Fitto, a member of Italy's hard-right ruling party, was named to a top post in the next European Commission today, in a controversial move that has riled centrist and leftist groups.
summary: Raffaele Fitto, a member of Italy's hard-right ruling party, was named to a top post in the next European Commission today, in a controversial move that has riled centrist and leftist groups.

title: Pics: Supercars Line Up At The World's Largest Temple, Tourists Stunned
content: The centuries-old temples of Cambodia's famed Angkor Wat played host to a parade of Rolls-Royces, Ferraris and Lamborghinis today, although drivers were banned from revving their supercharged engines.
summary: The centuries-old temples of Cambodia's famed Angkor Wat played host to a parade of Rolls-Royces, Ferraris and Lamborghinis today, although drivers were banned from revving their supercharged engines.

title: Haunting Last Words From Crew Onboard Doomed Titan Sub Revealed
content: At the hearing, The US Coast Guard also presented a haunting image of the OceanGate Titan submersible's tail cone.

title: 17-Year-Old Cheerleader From 'America's Got Talent'  Dies By Suicide
content: Her sudden death has sparked an outpouring of support and condolences from fans, fellow performers, and loved ones.
summary: Her sudden death has sparked an outpouring of support and condolences from fans, fellow performers, and loved ones.

title: Opinion: India's Options For Russia-Ukraine Peace Are Growing Complicated
content: That Modi will discuss India's initiative with Biden when he goes to the US this month is likely, now that he knows Putin's mind after his own talks with him and the feedback he has got from National Security Advisor Ajit Doval.
summary: That Modi will discuss India's initiative with Biden when he goes to the US this month is likely, now that he knows Putin's mind after his own talks with him and the feedback he has got from National Security Advisor Ajit Doval.

title: "I'm A Rapist, She Did Not Deserve This": Man Who Let 50 Men Rape His Wife
content: "I am a rapist," a 71-year-old Frenchman accused of drugging his wife so he and scores of strangers could assault her told a court Tuesday, returning to the dock after being ill for around a week.
summary: "I am a rapist," a 71-year-old Frenchman accused of drugging his wife so he and scores of strangers could assault her told a court Tuesday, returning to the dock after being ill for around a week.

title: Donald Trump Returns To Campaign After Fresh Assassination Bid
content: Donald Trump hits the campaign trail again on Tuesday, travelling to Michigan two days after an apparent assassination attempt against him was foiled at his golf course in Florida.
summary: Donald Trump hits the campaign trail again on Tuesday, travelling to Michigan two days after an apparent assassination attempt against him was foiled at his golf course in Florida.

title: How The Internet Went From Being Fun To Frustrating
content: When it comes to our experience of the internet, "the times, they are a-changin", as Bob Dylan would say. You can't quite recall how, but the internet certainly feels different these days.
summary: When it comes to our experience of the internet, "the times, they are a-changin", as Bob Dylan would say. You can't quite recall how, but the internet certainly feels different these days.

title: US Boy, 11, Arrested After Bragging About His Weapons And "Kill List"
content: An 11-year-old boy in the US who allegedly bragged about his massive cache of weapons and plans to execute a "kill list" at two different schools has been arrested.
summary: An 11-year-old boy in the US who allegedly bragged about his massive cache of weapons and plans to execute a "kill list" at two different schools has been arrested.

title: Donald Trump Launches New Cryptocurrency Platform With Family
content: Little was revealed about the Trump family crypto project during a two-hour online presentation other than an offer to let people buy digital "tokens" giving them a vote in platform decisions.
summary: Little was revealed about the Trump family crypto project during a two-hour online presentation other than an offer to let people buy digital "tokens" giving them a vote in platform decisions.

title: Drinking Water Doesn't Cure Hangover: Report
content: There is a long-standing belief that downing water after a night of heavy drinking can save you from a hangover. However, new research suggests that this popular remedy doesn't quite live up to its hype.
summary: There is a long-standing belief that downing water after a night of heavy drinking can save you from a hangover. However, new research suggests that this popular remedy doesn't quite live up to its hype.

title: S Jaishankar Speaks To NDTV As Modi Government 3.0 Completes 100 Days
content: External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar today spoke exclusively to NDTV's Sanjay Pugalia as the Modi Government 3.0 completes hundred days in office.
summary: External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar today spoke exclusively to NDTV's Sanjay Pugalia as the Modi Government 3.0 completes hundred days in office.

title: Meta Bans Russian State Media Outlets Worldwide For 'Interference Activity'
content: Meta late Monday said it is banning Russian state media outlets from its apps around the world due to "foreign interference activity."
summary: Meta late Monday said it is banning Russian state media outlets from its apps around the world due to "foreign interference activity."

title: Sean 'Diddy' Combs Arrested In New York City Amid Sexual Assault Lawsuit
content: Sean "Diddy" Combs -- the rap mogul whose star has plunged after a wave of sex trafficking accusations and assault lawsuits -- was arrested by federal agents in Manhattan late Monday, a US federal court said.
summary: Sean "Diddy" Combs -- the rap mogul whose star has plunged after a wave of sex trafficking accusations and assault lawsuits -- was arrested by federal agents in Manhattan late Monday, a US federal court said.

title: Super Harvest Moon And Partial Lunar Eclipse To Be Seen Tonight
content: Sky gazers are in for a double treat tonight with two celestial events occurring in a rare coincidence -- a super harvest Moon and partial lunar eclipse -- on Tuesday night.
summary: Sky gazers are in for a double treat tonight with two celestial events occurring in a rare coincidence -- a super harvest Moon and partial lunar eclipse -- on Tuesday night.

title: COP29 Leaders Announce New Climate Funding And Energy Storage Goals
content: Less than two months ahead of the COP29 United Nations Climate Summit, the Azerbaijani leadership laid out its plans on Tuesday for what it hoped to achieve, as countries continue to wrestle with how to raise ambitions for a new financing target.
summary: Less than two months ahead of the COP29 United Nations Climate Summit, the Azerbaijani leadership laid out its plans on Tuesday for what it hoped to achieve, as countries continue to wrestle with how to raise ambitions for a new financing target.

title: Amazon Tells Staff To Be Back In The Office Five Days A Week
content: In his memo, Mr Jassy wrote that he expects the employees to adhere to the new policy beginning January 2, 2025.
